column4: i do this "sudo mount -t ext3 /dev/fd0 /media/floppy0" and i get this error "mount: wrong fs type, bad option, bad superblock on /dev/fd0,missing codepage or other error In some cases useful info is found in syslog - try dmesg | tail  or so" can anybody plz help me ?

i do this "sudo mount -t ext3 /dev/fd0 /media/floppy0" and i get this error "mount: wrong fs type, bad option, bad superblock on /dev/fd0,missing codepage or other error In some cases useful info is found in syslog - try dmesg | tail  or so" can anybody plz help me ?
